data.title: Average food. Nothing to write home about.
data.text: The food was okay but nothing I would want to return for. I had been wanting to try it for awhile. I have to say I was a little disapointed.

data.title: Something for Everyone
data.text: This small Greek restaurant is not fancy, but they keep the place very clean and the management and staff are always friendly and efficient.   They have a huge menu that contains Greek and American choices.  They have typical Greek items like souvlaki and gyros, as well as some nontraditional items like lamb shank which is very good.    Prices run about $4 to $8 for a meal with large portions.  It is hard to leave this place hungry.  It is good for groups because everyone will find something they like.  We have also used their catering for work parties and they have a very reasonably priced catering menu.

data.title: Not Bad
data.text: Stopped in here to give it a try one night for dinner. The service by the staff was excellent. My chicken salad was excellent. The price was very reasonable for the portion size. The only reason I didn't mark it above average was simply because the building was a little old and the decor was a little run down looking. However, the food was very good!

data.title: Greart price for Gyros and Burgers, even breakfast
data.text: A great lunch stop for simple Greek foods, a burger or an omelette. I eat here frequently because the staff are friendly and the food portions are more than fair for the small price they ask.
